com.tranvietson.uml
Class Structure

java.lang.Object
  com.tranvietson.uml.Structure
All Implemented Interfaces:
StructureListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArgumentStructure, ClassStructure, InterfaceStructure, MethodStructure, PropertyStructure
public abstract class Structure
extends java.lang.Object
implements StructureListener

A very basic structure.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Tran Viet Son

Field Detail

name

java.lang.String name

type

java.lang.String type
Type of the structure. Some structures do not have a type

See Also:
config()

used_modifiers

boolean[] used_modifiers
Modifiers used with the structure. Stored as a flag array. Use with allowed_modifiers to determine which modifier is used

structure_name

java.lang.String structure_name
Name of the structure itself. It's different from name. Should be changed in the config() method

use_type

boolean use_type
The structure uses a type or not. Should be changed in the config() method

allowed_modifiers

java.lang.String[] allowed_modifiers
Modifiers are allowed to use with the structure. Should be changed in the config() method

Constructor Detail

Structure

public Structure()
Global Constructor

Method Detail

config

abstract void config()
Specifics structure configuration. Accepts type or not. Determine allowed modifiers. Register the structure name.

See Also:
structure_name, use_type, allowed_modifiers

             throws StructureException

setType

public void setType(java.lang.String type)
             throws StructureException
Checks if the type is valid and set it. Currently support both normal type (String, Integer) and specified (LinkedList<String>)

Parameters:
